ValidationRule.description: 012E0000000fHl4 - Comm Conn Property 00eE000000125Fl - Comm Conn Sales 00e40000000nYck - Frontier Admins 00eE0000000agkq - Channel Sales Support 00e8a000002XXex - Multifamily Leadership
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Account.RecordTypeId = "012E0000000fHl4", Owner.ProfileId <> "00eE000000125Fl", Owner.ProfileId <> "00e8a000002XXex", Owner.ProfileId <> "00eE0000000agkq", Owner.ProfileId <> "00e40000000nYck", Owner.ProfileId <> "012E0000000fHl4" )
